metadata.dataset_name: WEEKLY AVERAGE PRICES AT INDIAN AUCTIONS CTC Leaf & All Dust
metadata.source_name: Ministry of Commerce & Industry, Government of India
metadata.about: The "WEEKLY AVERAGE PRICES AT INDIAN AUCTIONS CTC leaf & All Dust" table provides essential information on the average prices of CTC (Crush, Tear, Curl) leaf and All Dust grades of tea at Indian auctions. The table is organized on a weekly basis, offering insights into price trends over time.
metadata.data_insights:
The table includes data for three major regions in India: South India, North India, and an overall figure for the entire country. The weekly averages are indicative of the prevailing market rates for CTC leaf and All Dust grades of tea in these regions.

As this table is updated weekly, it serves as a valuable resource for tea industry professionals, market analysts, and stakeholders to monitor and analyze price fluctuations in the Indian tea market, aiding them in making informed decisions and strategies based on the prevailing market conditions.
